website_summaries.verdict: This set of 3 ties and coordinating pocket squares is elegant and impressive when worn by a dapper gentleman.
pros: Available in many color schemes, each featuring ties with different patterns in a particular palette
Colors on ties are vibrant and these items are clearly high-quality
These are easy to tie into simple knots around neck
cons: Ties may arrive in boxes that differ from that shown on listing

customer_reviews.title: Not as Depicted...
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely dissapointed to find out the ties do not come in the box that was depicted here which ultimately was the reason I purchased the ties, they came in disposable boxes. In addition, the pocket squares show significant signs of fraying. This is such a common brand often priced significantly lower than the price depicted here, overall I was very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silk?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several of these ties since I like silk and the ties seemed to be good quality. The description on the Amazon Market Place claims that they are 100% silk. After examining the products first hand, I seriously doubt there is any silk in them. Actually, there is no claim that they are made from silk at all on the label. Polyester ties are fine if that's what you want but if you're looking for silk, I recommend you try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Warthog

customer_reviews.title: Decent Ties, Not Silk.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they seemed like nice ties, and to have a matching a pocket square is a nice touch. From the photos you can tell they are not silk. Once they arrive it is obvious they are not silk. Not even close to silk. It makes me wonder why they even have that in the title, when they are nice ties at a decent price, with some obvious effort to put together a good looking package. Why lie and say they are silk? I like the ties, but have to give one star for blatant unnecessary lies in their marketing.
customer_reviews.author: GuyGlasses

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed and should have saved the money and gone with ...
customer_reviews.text: The pictures of this product given you the false impression of subdued colors. I am afraid they are loud and almost unable to wear on a daily basis. T fabric is too thick and glossy, the support material is also too thick, the knot becomes somewhat unflattering once tied. I am disappointed and should have saved the money and gone with another tie.
customer_reviews.author: TucBug

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: One look at these ties is all it took to decide they would make a great birthday gift for my thirty something son. They were the right color and the patterns were eye catching, two of them have a classic look while the third is unique and modern. My son called me yesterday to thank me for his ties. He seems very pleased and that makes me happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ties
customer_reviews.text: My friend absolutely loved these ties. the colors are great and match all of his shirts. fantastic buy
customer_reviews.author: Anna Gorbach

customer_reviews.title: Great combos
customer_reviews.text: These tie combos are of great quality. And you can't beat the price. The colors were on point for the occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Yasha B

customer_reviews.title: Colors are more bright on advertisement
customer_reviews.text: They came pretty good. The fabric and the style looks exactly as the pictures. I take off one star because the colors are not exactly the same tone in the pictures (ex. In the picture looks more a Royal blue when the real one is navy blue) otherwise all is perfect. Nice fabric pretty good made. All its fine for now. Pretty nice and one size tie.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea, very sleek and classy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a Christmas gift for my uncle and he loved it! He loves showing up to work in his best suits, so now he has these well designed ties and matching pocket squares to really show off with. I looked at the products beforehand and they're of really great quality and look as good as they do in the picture. The designs are really elegant and impressive. If I got to go gift shopping for any of the men in my family or for my friends, I'm definitely going to come back here!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? Great quality ties and handkerchiefs! I only wish that the handkerchiefs were thicker, but for the money, nobody can beat this. For some reason, I bank for value, not prestige. If you're like me, you'll love this set.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't last
customer_reviews.text: The ties looked great at first, but one of them already had tiny loose threads on it (almost like it wasn't properly finished - not threads at the sides but from each of the dots). These got much worse after a single wear. Very poor value - would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D.

customer_reviews.title: Good gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this five stars because I believe it’s a great gift. I bought this for my boyfriend along with other stuff for Christmas knowing that we would be attending a holiday party. The box that it comes with is very nice looking and all the ties and other things are wrapped up in plastic. I would buy again in the future in a different color so that he can have options in the future
customer_reviews.author: Marion marrufo

customer_reviews.title: My fiancee loved them so much we will continue to purchase from ...
customer_reviews.text: These were lost/delayed in customs so I was not able to give as a Christmas or birthday gift. However, the vendor worked hard to substitute this boxed set. My fiancee loved them so much we will continue to purchase from this vender. Vender even included a free tie and pocket square of my choice, which was also of good quality. Fabric is high quality and colors are saturated and bright. You will not be disappointed with these products.
customer_reviews.author: Gaile

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these ties for several business interviews and the colors and quality are superior. However, I found the ties to be a bit wider and thicker than other ties I own making the knot look large and sometimes messy. Overall, great product and I would buy again for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, high quality, slow shipping from China.
customer_reviews.text: The shipping took a looooong time, but it DID arrive within the timeframe they estimated initially AND I ordered mid-December so it was close to Christmas. The product is BEAUTIFUL!!! Very high quality and was worth the wait. I’d order from them again if I didn’t need something in a few days/quickly. I emailed them when we were a few weeks in and there were no shipping updates and they responded VERY quickly and they were very kind. My item got stuck in customs at Christmas so it camped there for a bit. Again, beautiful product and high quality. Exactly as it looked on their amazon site!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great tie, husband approved!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality ties and most important husband approved, he is very selective with his ties and likes the quality of these, he will be sporting the navy tie at a wedding next Saturday. I purchased these as part of our 12th “silk” Anniversary gift.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Classy Gift
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for me and I was very pleased. I wear ties at least three times a week, and I was very impressed with the matching handkerchief
customer_reviews.author: Dustin T.

customer_reviews.title: Very Wide Ties
customer_reviews.text: The ties are a little wide for my taste. I don’t wear skinny ties but these things are kind of clownish. Also, definitely not silk.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: great quality, fun designs and great sturdy box
customer_reviews.text: great quality, fun designs and great sturdy box. It is a gift and I am confident it will be liked as much. This product also came fast especially during the holiday rush.

feature_bullets: Cost-effective mixed Set 3 Pack, three different styles tie combinations,suitable for most occasions:Business, Wedding, Party, Dating..
We focus on tie many years, good quality interlining makes our ties heavy weighted and elastic, which are easily designed for a perfect knot. It also can be used as a thoughtful gift.
Adopting the soft and good texture, it is comfortable to wear and to touch, which is must-have accessory for any successful men.Made of high material, can be used for long time.

Tie Width: 3.4 inches(8.5cm); Tie Length: 59 inches(150cm); Handkerchief size: 10 inches x 10 inches(25cm x 25cm); Material: 100% silk; Crafts: jacquard woven tie; Package include: tie and handkerchief
For more high quality tie with unbeatable price,please click our brand name"HISDERN",we have 1000+ style for choose,we also have extra long tie,it is worth to buy.
